title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7817.5 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7817.5 - Penalties

State Regulations

The penalty for a violation of this Part by any owner or
operator of a cogeneration, small hydro or alternate energy production facility
shall not exceed $10,000 for each separate and distinct
violation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7817.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
